dialogue: Hey Steve McSteve.
Hey man, what's up? I can't talk for long.
Wait, you're not mad that I'm calling?
Nah. My boss has stepped out. I seriously only have a minute though. What did you want to talk about?
Oh, shit. Um. Um.
Quinn, why did you call me?
I need to come up with something better.
What?
If we don't have much time, I don't want to waste it on what I was originally calling you about! What can we talk about in just a minute?? God, that's so little time.
Why did you call me??
No, Steve! Let it go! We can do so much better!
What the hell is wrong with you?
Okay, I've got it! The perfect topic. It'll take exactly a minute to discuss, and we'll get so much out of it.
Cool. What is it?
It'll be so good for us, both individually AND together. This could be a true moment of personal growth for each of us, as well as strengthening our friendship.
Uh, okay. Sounds great. Hit me.
Okay! So, Steve, tell me - in your own words - exactly what you think about...-
Ah, shit. My boss is back. Gotta go! Talk to you later.
Steve, no! We could have...we were going to...
He hangs up. Damn it! I guess I'll never know which is his favorite Crash Bandicoot boss fight.
